trans-unit.source: A helper class that creates <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence"></xref> instances.

Once created, the DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator creates new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instances, sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> and increments the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> for each successive <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instance created.
trans-unit.target: DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator 새 만들어를 만든 후 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>집합 인스턴스에 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A>를 증가 시킵니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A>각각에 대해 연속 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>인스턴스 생성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref> class with the specified instance ID and sequence ID.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"> </xref> 지정 된 클래스 인스턴스 ID 및 시퀀스 id입니다.
